sentences.en: A diagram represents things in only two dimensions.
sentences.cn: 示意图只能二维地呈现物体。
长五厘米、宽两厘米的长方形

sentences.en: A third dimension has been recently added, that of service.
sentences.cn: 最近又提出了第三方面的需求, 即服务的需要.

sentences.en: Except for the Export - Import Bank, it lacked an economic dimension.
sentences.cn: 除了进出口银行, 它缺乏经济方面的内容.

sentences.en: In one dimension, any force that depends only on position is conservative.
sentences.cn: 一维运动中, 凡只取决于位置的力都是保守力.

sentences.en: Keep in mind that it's the small dimension of the slit which does the spreading out.
sentences.cn: 记住,正是因为狭缝很窄而造成这种扩展的.

sentences.en: Length is one dimension, and breadth is another.
sentences.cn: 长是一种度量, 宽又是另一种度量.

sentences.en: The dimension of sample transfer system is such that the size of sample limited.
sentences.cn: 样品输送装置要求限定样品的分量.

sentences.en: The drastic reduction in the geometric dimension leads to great simplification in mathematical analysis.
sentences.cn: 几何维数的急剧减少导致数字分析的极大简化.

sentences.en: Their perspective would not include the necessary third dimension.
sentences.cn: 它们的观察能力不包括必要的第三维.

sentences.en: There is a dimension to the problem that we have not discussed.
sentences.cn: 这问题还有一方面我们没讨论过.

sentences.en: There is a political dimension to the accusations.
sentences.cn: 这些指控含有政治方面的因素。

sentences.en: There is another dimension to this problem which you haven't considered.
sentences.cn: 这个问题还有你尚未考虑到的另一方面.

sentences.en: There was undeniably a strong theoretical dimension to his thinking.
sentences.cn: 不可否认，他的思想很有理论深度。

sentences.en: This adds a new dimension to our work.
sentences.cn: 这给我们的工作增添了新的内容。

sentences.en: This author has found the most suitable characteristic dimension to be the equivalent passage diameter.
sentences.cn: 这个作者发现了更恰当的特性作为当量通道直径.

sentences.en: Using this definition, potential has the dimension of length.
sentences.cn: 利用这个定义, 势具有长度单位.

sentences.en: You can have a spiritual dimension to your life without being religious.
sentences.cn: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

phrases.tran_cn: 特性尺度；性能尺寸；基准尺寸
最大尺寸；轮廓尺寸；总尺寸
实际尺寸；物理维度；外形尺寸；体积
第三维；立体感；栩栩如生

trans.tran_cn: 方面，尺寸，范围，规模，维度
trans.tran_en: a part of a situation or a quality involved in it
